songs.title: Intro (1.21 Gigawatts: Back to the First Time)
songs.album: 1.21 Gigawatts: Back To the First Time
songs.lyrics:
Luda!

[Verse: Ludacris]
They say that real recognize real -
And I'm as real as they come, don't ever doubt me
You ain't never seen, read, or heard no fake shit about me
I'm a G! So all you hoes can eat a dick up and die
While I puff the magic dragon, heat the weed up and fly
Tuck your tail between your legs, ya'll ain't made for this shit
Worth a hundred million dollars, ya'll ain't paid for this shit
I'm talking Empire Building, we got Prada flows
And y'all so pussy you should fit in Lady Gaga's clothes
Nobody really wanna go there with me
Nobody really wanna say my name
Nobody wanna put the pedal to the metal
And meet me up in the ghetto we can throw them thangs
When I come up to the spot, in the drop top
With the Glock cocked, that'll make a nigga pop lock
Ludacris, I'mma hot shot, straight up out the block
With a knot that'll get a nigga block knocked (OW!)
Somebody tell 'em that I ain't playin with 'em!
Put a pussy nigga 6 feet deep in the ground and you'll be layin with 'em
I just been watchin over, from my mighty throne
Ya'll Roberto Duran, so just leave it alone

No Mas! No Mas!
